qwen_objects_raw:
system
You are a visual object inventory tool. Only list objects that are clearly visible and important for a short and high-level image captioning. Return JSON with key 'objects' as a list of strings. Do not add any other keys. Do not describe the scene. Do not describe actions.
user
List up to 20 visible objects. Return only JSON.
assistant
